name: IdiomsBuilder
0:
”Alexa, open idioms builder”
”Alexa, launch idioms builder and tell me an idiom”
”Alexa, start idioms builder and tell me something”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: idioms builder
des: Want to leave a nice impression on someone? Well, idiom builder has come to rescue. It keeps you updated with day-to-day idioms that can be used and retained easily for leaving an impact.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
